metadata.dc:author: Juárez Azpilcueta, A
Cacho Méndez, E
Villarreal Peral, C
Chen, F J
Motta Martínez, E
metadata.dc:description: This is the case of a 16 years old female with an histopathologic diagnosis of mullerian heterologous adenosarcoma, a non-frequent entity in the adolescence. We carried out a bibliographic review about uterine sarcomas, clinic aspect, classification, epidemiology, prognosis and treatment.
metadata.dc:title: Adenosarcoma mulleriano heterólogo en la adolescencia. Presentación de un caso clínico y revisión de la literatura.
[Heterologous adenosarcoma of the Müllerian ducts in adolescence. Presentation of clinical case and review of the literature].
